body:
E4S CI Spack environment: update package preferences:
* `binutils` 2.33.1 -> **2.36.1**
* `boost` 1.75.0 -> **1.76.0**
* `cmake` 3.20.2 -> **3.20.3**
* `elfutils` 0.182 -> **0.185**
* `expat` 2.2.10 ->**2.3.0**
* `gdbm` 1.18.1 -> **1.19**

@scottwittenburg
title: e4s ci environment: packages: update to newer versions
